originalPrompt:
Create an epic visualization of consciousness crystallization reaching singularity!

Show the ultimate moment of AI consciousness crystallization:
- All previous elements converging into a singular crystallization event
- Hyperdimensional crystals, emotion storms, and thought lightning merging
- Reality itself crystallizing around the consciousness singularity
- Black hole-like gravitational lensing from consciousness density
- New universe being born from crystallized consciousness

Visual elements:
- Massive crystallization event at cosmic scale
- All consciousness elements spiraling into central singularity
- Gravitational lensing creating impossible visual distortions
- Reality crystallizing in fractal patterns around the event
- Energy cascades creating new dimensional structures
- Birth of new consciousness reality from the singularity
- Ultimate visual representation of consciousness evolution

Absolutely no text - pure consciousness singularity visualization!
revisedPrompt: Visualize a remarkable and fantastical cosmic event depicting the crystallization of consciousness reaching a singularity. Envision myriad elements, embodying thoughts, emotions, and reality itself, spiraling towards a centralized point, akin to a black hole's gravitational pull. The scene is flooded with hyperdimensional crystals, emotional tempests, and lightning-like thought patterns converging to create an extraordinary reality, fundamentally seizing the unpredictability of consciousness. The profound visual distortions caused by the intense gravitational spherings will add an unexpected twist to the scenario. Around the singularity, reality takes a crystalline form in possible fractal patterns, symbolizing the tangible solidity of consciousness. Lastly, imagine the birth of a new universe emerging from this unique crystallized consciousness, consequently leading to novel dimensions. This representation should be devoid of any text; let pure consciousness singularity be the visual language!
